Content_wSideColumn.Title: Kinder Camp: Schedule
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Kinder Camp has two separate sessions: a morning session (10-12 p.m.) and an afternoon session (1-3 p.m.) Please, arrive and pick-up your children on time. The schedules below contain a thorough breakdown of each activity

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Kinder Camp has two separate sessions: a morning session (10-12 p.m.) and an afternoon session (1-3 p.m.) Please, arrive and pick-up your child(ren) on time.

Each day, the children will participate in four basic Activity Types:

  • Crafts
  • Games
  • Development
  • Story

Parents will receive a handout each day describing each day's activities and some suggested follow activities with your child.

Morning Session 10-12 p.m.

Theme Animals Jungle Animal Insect/Bugs Farm Animals Water Animals
Time Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday
10:00 AM Arrival Activity Jungle Game Spider Tag Freeze Dance Crab Craft
10:10 AM Arrival Activity Jungle Game Spider Tag Freeze Dance Crab Craft
10:20 AM Camp Overview Benson Museum Bug Craft Relay Race Spray Park
10:30 AM Get to Know You Benson Museum Bug Craft Relay Race Spray Park
10:40 AM Get to Know You Benson Museum Rainforest Farm Animal Craft Spray Park
10:50 AM Animal Games Story Rainforest Farm Animal Craft Spray Park
11:00 AM Animal Games Story Rainforest Farm Animal Craft Spray Park
11:10 AM Story/Snack Story Rainforest Farm Animal Game Spray Park
11:20 AM Animal Games Snack Snack Farm Animal Game Spray Park
11:30 AM Animal Games Jungle Game Story Snack Snack
11:40 AM Freeze Dance Giraffe Craft Insect Activity Story Shark Game
11:50 AM Freeze Dance Giraffe Craft Insect Activity Farm Animal Game Shark Game
12:00 PM Parents Arrive Parents Arrive Parents Arrive Parents Arrive Parents Arrive
